mean_en: used to describe two or more people or things that are next to each other in a line
word_etyma: a在… + breast胸膛 → 胸膛在一条线上 → abreast 并列
short_phrase: place the pipes abreast of each other
sentence: We usually lay the gas and water pipes abreast of each other in the same trench.
sentence_trans: 我们一般把气管和水管并列放在同一个沟壕里。
